name: evolution-api
description: Rest api for communication with WhatsApp

scripts.start: npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/postgresql-schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/postgresql-schema.prisma && node dist/main
scripts.db:deploy: node runWithProvider.js "rm -rf ./prisma/migrations && cp -r ./prisma/DATABASE_PROVIDER-migrations ./prisma/migrations && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma/DATABASE_PROVIDER-schema.prisma"
scripts.db:deploy:win: node runWithProvider.js "xcopy /E /I prisma\DATABASE_PROVIDER-migrations prisma\migrations && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma\DATABASE_PROVIDER-schema.prisma"
scripts.db:migrate:dev: node runWithProvider.js "rm -rf ./prisma/migrations && cp -r ./prisma/DATABASE_PROVIDER-migrations ./prisma/migrations && npx prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma/DATABASE_PROVIDER-schema.prisma && cp -r ./prisma/migrations/* ./prisma/DATABASE_PROVIDER-migrations"
scripts.db:migrate:dev:win: node runWithProvider.js "xcopy /E /I prisma\DATABASE_PROVIDER-migrations prisma\migrations && npx prisma migrate dev --schema prisma\DATABASE_PROVIDER-schema.prisma"
